title: New: Oceaán – To Lose
body:
After dominating blogs last year with the soulful, R&B inspired _Need U_ Mancunian sensation **Oceaán** returns with new track _To Lose_, lifted from an EP set to be released through Chess Club Records.

Channeling Miguel, alongside two of last years fastest rising electronic artists, Kwabs and SOHN, it blossoms beautifully, and is quite possibly the most exciting new track of the year thus far.
